content.prompt: Which of the following criticisms of political campaigns is the author of the political cartoon most likely to agree with?

choices.label: Political campaigns have not adequately adapted to the increase in social media usage in modern society.
Rising campaign costs and intensive fund-raising efforts make running for office too expensive for the average citizen.
The duration of election cycles is too long.
Candidates rely too heavily on professional consultants.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the argument or perspective in the source relates to political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
